Sentencas: The electrical conductivity and the Seebeck coefficient of one self produced Ca-doped LaCrO3 interconnector plate and two commercial Ca- and Sr-doped LaCrO3 interconnector plates for solid oxide fuel cells have been studied by 4 point DC measurements from oxidizing to reducing atmospheres.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical conductivity and Seebeck coefficient of Ca- and Sr-doped LaCrO3

Sentencas: The microstructure was studied on both as-sintered samples and samples exposed to a CO2 rich atmosphere.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical conductivity and Seebeck coefficient of Ca- and Sr-doped LaCrO3

Sentencas: The commercial Sr-doped LaCrO3 has a higher electrical conductivity than the self produced Ca-doped LaCrO3, while the latter seemed to be most resistant to CO2 rich atmosphere.
Titulo: Investigation of electrical conductivity and Seebeck coefficient of Ca- and Sr-doped LaCrO3
